author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 6,950 students are appearing for the State Learning Ability Achievement Survey (SLAS-2015) examinations that commenced here on Tuesday.

The examinations are being held for Tamil, mathematics, and English for students of Standards III, and V on Tuesday and Wednesday. For students of Standards VII, and VIII, the examination will be held on Thursday and Friday.

Over 350 students sat for the examinations from Krishnagiri taluk on Tuesday.
title: Ability examination commences
